Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.ViewStates

Class LobbiesScreenState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.ViewStates.ViewState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.View.Client.ViewStates.LobbiesScreenState
public class LobbiesScreenState extends ViewState
Represents the lobbies screen state of the client-side view. Extends ViewState.

  • Field Summary

    • quit

      public void quit()
      Initiates the process of quitting the application. If the client is currently in a lobby, first requests to leave the lobby. Displays the quitting screen on the selected view and waits for confirmation from the server. Upon confirmation, resets the client and transitions to the title screen state.
      Overrides:
      quit in class ViewState
